<script>
(function() {
  // Detect base path from document location or known patterns
  function getBasePath() {
    const path = window.location.pathname;
    // Match /ECON1550/ or similar course repo pattern
    const match = path.match(/^(\/[A-Z]+\d+[^\/]*)\//);
    if (match) return match[1];
    // Check if we're at root (local dev)
    return '';
  }

  const basePath = getBasePath();

  // Fix navigation links to use absolute paths
  document.querySelectorAll('#link-grid a[data-page]').forEach(link => {
    const page = link.getAttribute('data-page');
    if (page) {
      link.href = basePath + '/' + page;
    }
  });

  // Also fix the materials link in release-info
  const materialsBtn = document.querySelector('.release-actions a');
  if (materialsBtn) {
    materialsBtn.href = basePath + '/materials.html';
  }

  const urlPath = window.location.pathname;

  // URL patterns to match assignments
  const patterns = [
    { regex: /\/files\/psets\/(pset\d+)\/pset\d+\.pdf$/, type: 'questions' },
    { regex: /\/files\/psets\/(pset\d+)\/pset\d+_solutions\.pdf$/, type: 'solutions' },
    { regex: /\/files\/psets\/(pset\d+)\/pset\d+-src\.zip$/, type: 'questions' },
    { regex: /\/files\/lectures\/lecture_notes_ECON1550\.pdf$/, type: 'questions', id: 'lecture_notes' },
    { regex: /\/files\/slides\/(\d+)-([^\/]+)\.pdf$/, type: 'questions', kindPrefix: 'slides' }
  ];

  let assignmentId = null;
  let requestType = null;

  for (const pattern of patterns) {
    const m = urlPath.match(pattern.regex);
    if (m) {
      if (pattern.id) {
        assignmentId = pattern.id;
      } else if (pattern.kindPrefix === 'slides') {
        const num = m[1];
        const slug = m[2];
        assignmentId = `slides-${num}-${slug.split('-').slice(0, 2).join('-')}`;
      } else {
        assignmentId = m[1];
      }
      requestType = pattern.type;
      break;
    }
  }

  if (!assignmentId) return;

  document.getElementById('loading-message').classList.remove('hidden');
  document.getElementById('generic-404').classList.add('hidden');

  // Try to fetch manifest with base path, fall back to root
  const manifestUrl = basePath + '/files/release_manifest.json';

  fetch(manifestUrl)
    .then(response => {
      if (!response.ok) throw new Error('Manifest not found');
      return response.json();
    })
    .then(manifest => {
      document.getElementById('loading-message').classList.add('hidden');

      const assignment = manifest.assignments.find(a => {
        if (a.id === assignmentId) return true;
        if (assignmentId.startsWith('slides-')) {
          return a.id.startsWith(assignmentId.substring(0, 10));
        }
        return false;
      });

      if (!assignment) {
        document.getElementById('generic-404').classList.remove('hidden');
        return;
      }

      let releaseDate = null;
      let message = '';

      if (requestType === 'solutions') {
        if (assignment.stage === 'solutions') {
          document.getElementById('generic-404').classList.remove('hidden');
          return;
        }
        releaseDate = assignment.sol_release_at_local;
        message = releaseDate
          ? 'Solutions will be available after the assignment deadline.'
          : 'Solutions for this assignment are not available.';
      } else {
        if (assignment.stage !== 'none') {
          document.getElementById('generic-404').classList.remove('hidden');
          return;
        }
        releaseDate = assignment.pre_release_at_local;
        message = releaseDate
          ? 'This material will be released soon.'
          : 'This material has not been scheduled for release.';
      }

      if (releaseDate) {
        const date = new Date(releaseDate);
        const options = {
          weekday: 'long',
          year: 'numeric',
          month: 'long',
          day: 'numeric',
          hour: 'numeric',
          minute: '2-digit',
          timeZoneName: 'short'
        };
        const formatted = date.toLocaleString('en-US', options);
        message = `Available on <strong>${formatted}</strong>`;
      }

      document.getElementById('material-title').textContent = assignment.title;
      document.getElementById('release-message').innerHTML = message;
      document.getElementById('release-info').classList.remove('hidden');
    })
    .catch(() => {
      document.getElementById('loading-message').classList.add('hidden');
      document.getElementById('generic-404').classList.remove('hidden');
    });
})();
</script>
